data.name: Message_GenerateLocation
data.value: Generated unit information will be contained in "{0}".

data.name: Message_InputCommand
data.value: Enter URL of the unit information XML (Leave empty if "{0}" exists, or 'amend' when applying "{0}" to "{1}"):

data.name: CoordinatesOverride_SeeReadme
data.value: See README for guidance on editing this file.

data.name: CoordinatesOverride_Headings
data.value: [Traditional Chinese Name] [Proposed Address] [Longtitude Offset] [Latitude Offset] [Registered Address]

data.name: Exception_LineTooLong
data.value: A line is abnormally long and cannot be read.

data.name: Exception_NotPositiveInteger
data.value: Supplied {0} is not a positive integer.
